modName: Frosty glass sword and glass greatsword
summary: Request from Tytanis. Two frosty blades was asked for, and this is what got delievered ^^
descriptionHtml:
Got a request for two \"frosty\" blades from Tytanis, this is what currently came out =) 

Marked up all/some of the engraved areas on the texture and added some color with glow to it.
Also played around a bit with shades, color hues and glow effect.
Enjoy!


Install:

Just place the Data folder straight into the Skyrim folder, nothing else is required.

These textures will replace the original glass sword and glass greatsword.


Uninstall: Just remove the folder added from the rar and you\'re all set =)


Credits to Bethesda for a great game, the tireless efforts of SkyrimNexus to keep the site going
and of course all the modders that add new tools and database updates so any modding at all can be done!

Sincerely

PV__86
author: Squirrel86
